import sys
sys.path.append(''.'')

print(''Phase 6 Module Integration Test'')
try:
    import config

    from backtesting.strategy_validator import StrategyValidator  
    from backtesting.historical_analyzer import HistoricalAnalyzer
    from backtesting.performance_visualizer import PerformanceVisualizer
    
    print(''[PASS] All Phase 6 modules imported'')
    
    # ë°±í…ŒìŠ¤íŒ… ì—”ì§„ ì´ˆê¸°í™” í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸

    analyzer = HistoricalAnalyzer(config_instance)

    print(''[PASS] StrategyValidator initialized'')
